QuestData.Title: I Think She's Hungry
QuestData.Description: It looks like your young raptor is hungry. If you're looking to keep her, why don't you find something for her to eat? The lashtail often attack the basilisks of Stranglethorn, which can be found to the east, beyond Kurzen's Compound.$b$bShe probably isn't strong enough to hunt on her own yet, but I'm sure she will eat freshly killed basilisk meat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Crystal Spine Basilisks in Northern Stranglethorn, and let your Lashtail Raptor eat 40 bites of their meat.
QuestData.RewardText: She looks bigger already! You can see, these raptors grow quickly. You are lucky to have found such a strong companion.$b$bKeep her by your side as long as you can, $n. I'm sure she will prove to be an asset in the future.
